title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to  - use auto brake during landing
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can use the auto brake functionality during a landing. We are flying in a Boeing 747 and are approaching JFK Airport. During this video I will show you the impact of the different auto brake modes during the roll out on the runway.
